## Introduction

Welcome to Machine Learning tutorials with R. This is a mini-site of [kyrcha.info](http://kyrcha.info) I've created in rmarkdown to host notes on R and ML algorithms for two Data Mining courses I teach.

## Links

- [R project](https://www.r-project.org/)
    - [R official manuals](https://cran.r-project.org/manuals.html)
    - [R packages](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/available_packages_by_name.html)
- [R studio](https://www.rstudio.com/) Nice R IDE that works in Linux, Mac and Windows systems.
